original_text:
Crown of Egypt
Crown of Egypt è una video slot online gratis del popolare provider IGT. Come suggerisce il nome, questo gioco si ispira all’antica civiltà egiziana con un’ambientazione molto suggestiva e una grafica di buon livello. Lo schermo è incorniciato da colonne dorate decorate da preziosi geroglifici tutti da decifrare…
Il prezioso gameplay
La struttura della slot online Crown of Egypt Slot che non si deve scaricare, è composta da 5 rulli e 1024 linee di pagamento. Questa slot machine può essere giocata usando da una a trenta monete a giro. Inoltre sul piatto c’è in palio un jackpot da 5000 gettoni sulla tua scommessa totale e un RTP del 95,03%. Se preferisci giocare senza alcuna interferenza, puoi usare la pratica funzione “Auto Spin” impostando da cinque a mille giocate in automatico. Puoi decidere di provare la slot Crown Egypt in uno qualsiasi dei nostri casinò online, basta consultare la fornita libreria.
Simboli e funzioni da tenere d’occhio
Lo slot Crown of Egypt include:

Un simbolo Jolly che è anche il logo della slot. Questo Wild può sostituire qualsiasi simbolo per completare combinazioni vincenti e può apparire ovunque tranne sul rullo uno.
Un simbolo Scatter rappresentato dalla Piramide. Questa icona è molto importante e ti sarà utile per far partire il bonus Giri Gratuiti.
La funzione speciale MultiWay Xtra che ti permette 1024 combinazioni vincenti a giro, con rotazione da entrambi le parti.

Le nostre conclusioni
Nonostante il grande potenziale di giri gratis offerto dalla slot online Crown of Egypt, dobbiamo ammettere che per un giocatore professionista i limiti di puntata impostati da IGT sono davvero bassi, il valore di scommessa massima è infatti di 2,40€. Per i meno esperti invece questo gioco è ricco di tesori nascosti e simboli tutti da scoprire. Una volta raccolte potrai controllare le tue combinazioni vincenti direttamente dalla pratica “Tabella dei Pagamenti” all’interno del sito. La strada per raggiungere un ricco bottino non è immediata, conviene sempre prendere un po’ di confidenza con il gameplay, sfruttando la modalità demo gratis. Se invece ti senti un vero faraone, puoi cominciare a selezionare le linee di pagamento, decidere il budget a  disposizione e magari utilizzare il pulsante “AutoPlay”, affidando le tue puntate alle giocate automatiche con soldi veri e al misterioso destino di civiltà lontane.

raw_translation.response:
Crown of Egypt
Crown of Egypt is a free online video slot game from the popular provider IGT. As the name suggests, this game is inspired by the ancient Egyptian civilization with a very suggestive setting and good-quality graphics. The screen is framed by golden columns decorated with precious hieroglyphs waiting to be deciphered...

The precious gameplay
The structure of the online slot Crown of Egypt Slot, which does not require any downloading, consists of 5 reels and 1024 paylines. This slot machine can be played using one to thirty coins per spin. Furthermore, there is a 5000 coins jackpot at stake on your total bet and an RTP of 95.03%. If you prefer to play without any interference, you can use the handy "Auto Spin" feature, setting between five and a thousand automatic plays. You can choose to try the Crown Egypt slot in any of our online casinos, just consult the provided library.

Symbols and functions to keep an eye on
The Crown of Egypt slot includes:

A Wild symbol which is also the slot's logo. This Wild can replace any symbol to complete winning combinations and can appear anywhere except on the first reel.
A Scatter symbol represented by the Pyramid. This icon is very important and will come in handy to start the Free Spins bonus.
The special MultiWay Xtra feature which allows you 1024 winning combinations per spin, with rotation from both sides.

Our conclusions
Despite the potential for free spins offered by the Crown of Egypt online slot, we must admit that for an experienced gambler, the betting limits set by IGT are really low, in fact, the maximum betting value is only 2.40€. For less experienced players, on the other hand, this game is full of hidden treasures and symbols just waiting to be discovered. Once collected, you can check your winning combinations directly from the handy "Paytable" feature within the site. The road to a rich bounty is not immediate, it is always advisable to get a bit more familiar with the gameplay, making use of the free demo mode. If, on the other hand, you feel like a true pharaoh, you can start selecting paylines, decide on a budget and maybe use the "AutoPlay" button, entrusting your bets to automatic plays with real money and the mysterious fate of distant civilizations.

Anyway, back to the game. It has 5 reels, but get this - a whopping 1024 paylines! That's more paylines than there are grains of sand in the Sahara Desert. Okay, maybe not quite, but it's still a lot. And the best part? You can play it for free at IGT. So you can keep your own treasures safe instead of having to offer them up to the pharaoh.

When you first open the game, you'll notice that the screen is framed by golden columns decorated with precious hieroglyphs. You'll feel as though you've been transported back in time to the land of the pyramids. Just be careful not to wake any curses while you're playing. Crown of Egypt, in our not-so-humble opinion, is one of the most exciting and engaging slot games out there. It's a five-reel slot with a very generous 1024 paylines, meaning that players can benefit from numerous winning combinations. If you're still getting to grips with paylines, don't fret- Crown of Egypt keeps it straightforward for you!

response.content:

The game also has a Wild symbol that can help you complete winning combinations by substituting any other symbol on the reels. And if you're lucky enough to land three or more Scatter symbols, you'll trigger the Free Spins Bonus. More spins mean more chances to win big!

If you're looking for a game that will keep you entertained while increasing your chances of winning, then Crown of Egypt is the perfect choice. With its unique features and winning potential, it's clear why this game has been a fan favorite for years.

So, what are you waiting for? Go ahead and give Crown of Egypt a spin. Who knows, maybe you'll be the next ruler of your own kingdom with a pocket full of gold!

Review:
 
Game Description

Crown of Egypt is an online video slot game inspired by the ancient Egyptian civilization. It has 5 reels and 1024 paylines, and it is available for free at IGT. The screen is framed by golden columns decorated with precious hieroglyphs.

Gameplay

The Crown of Egypt online slot machine doesn't require any downloading, and it can be played using one to thirty coins per spin. The Auto Spin feature allows you to play up to a thousand automatic plays. The game has a 5000 coins jackpot at stake on your total bet with an RTP of 95.03%.

Winning Combinations

The Crown of Egypt slot game offers players 1024 winning combinations per spin with rotation from both sides, thanks to the special MultiWay Xtra feature. This game also includes a Wild symbol that can replace any symbol to complete winning combinations and a Scatter symbol represented by a Pyramid.

Bonus Features

The Scatter symbol in the Crown of Egypt slot is essential as it can start the Free Spins bonus. If you manage to collect enough symbols, you can check your winning combinations directly from the Paytable feature available within the site.

Betting Limits

Although the Crown of Egypt offers potential for free spins, the betting limits set by IGT are quite low. The maximum betting value is only 2.40€. Experienced gamblers may find this limiting, but less experienced players can still enjoy the game’s hidden treasures and symbols. Always try the free demo mode before committing real money.

The screen is framed by golden columns decorated with precious hieroglyphs waiting to be deciphered...

The precious gameplay
The structure of the online slot Crown of Egypt Slot, which does not require any downloading, consists of 5 reels and 1024 paylines. This slot machine can be played using one to thirty coins per spin. Furthermore, there is a 5000 coins jackpot at stake on your total bet and an RTP of 95.03%. If you prefer to play without any interference, you can use the handy "Auto Spin" feature, setting between five and a thousand automatic plays. You can choose to try the Crown Egypt slot in any of our online casinos, just consult the provided library.

Symbols and functions to keep an eye on
The Crown of Egypt slot includes:

A Wild symbol which is also the slot's logo. This Wild can replace any symbol to complete winning combinations and can appear anywhere except on the first reel.
A Scatter symbol represented by the Pyramid. This icon is very important and will come in handy to start the Free Spins bonus.
The special MultiWay Xtra feature which allows you 1024 winning combinations per spin, with rotation from both sides.

Our conclusions
Despite the potential for free spins offered by the Crown of Egypt online slot, we must admit that for an experienced gambler, the betting limits set by IGT are really low, in fact, the maximum betting value is only 2.40€. For less experienced players, on the other hand, this game is full of hidden treasures and symbols just waiting to be discovered. Once collected, you can check your winning combinations directly from the handy "Paytable" feature within the site. The road to a rich bounty is not immediate, it is always advisable to get a bit more familiar with the gameplay, making use of the free demo mode. If, on the other hand, you feel like a true pharaoh, you can start selecting paylines, decide on a budget and maybe use the "AutoPlay" button, entrusting your bets to automatic plays with real money and the mysterious fate of distant civilizations.
